findings.message:
[Warning] The Assignment block Assignment was found in subsystem While_Iteration. Theres a possibility for index out-of-bounds write access.
[Whitelisted] false positive, the maximum number of iterations of the while loop is now defined explicitely

[Info] Found Assignment Block Assignment1 connected to For Iterator with internal iteration limit equal to output size of Assignment Block in subsystem getSegment_2DMppRoadTyp.
[Whitelisted] only information, no need to do anything as it is already secured
